DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I. Assess safety efficacy sodium phenylbutyrate , sodium benzoate , sodium phenylacetate , dietary intervention patient urea cycle disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study Sodium Phenylbutyrate , Sodium Benzoate , Sodium Phenylacetate , Dietary Intervention Urea Cycle Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This protocol describe several clinical study pharmacologic dietary management patient urea cycle disorder . Patients carbamyl phosphate synthetase ornithine transcarbamylase deficiency treat low-protein diet , essential amino acid ( neonatal onset disease ) , caloric supplementation , oral sodium phenylbutyrate ( approved prescription drug 11/97 ) , citrulline arginine free base . Patients argininosuccinic acid synthetase deficiency treat low-protein diet , caloric supplementation , oral sodium phenylbutyrate ( approved prescription drug 11/97 ) , arginine free base . Patients argininosuccinic aciduria ( AA ) treat low-protein diet , caloric supplementation , arginine free base . ( Discontinued 11/97 ) Any patient develops hyperammonemia treat intravenous sodium benzoate , sodium phenylbutyrate , arginine hydrochloride ; benzoate phenylbutyrate give patient AA . If ammonium stabilize normal near normal level , intravenous medication gradually replace oral medication . If significant decrease ammonium within 8 hour , patient begin hemodialysis . Concurrent therapy ondansetron , high caloric intake , mannitol elevate intracranial pressure allow . Dietary intravenous nitrogen prohibit . ( Discontinued 11/97 )
DOC.criteria: PROTOCOL ENTRY CRITERIA : Urea cycle deficiency , i.e . : Carbamyl phosphate synthetase deficiency ( CPSD ) Ornithine transcarbamylase deficiency ( OTCD ) Argininosuccinic acid synthetase deficiency ( ASD ) Argininosuccinic aciduria ( AA )
